author: nurfikri89
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the following in MiniAOD and NanoAOD:

- AK8 subjet taggers: Remove DeepCSV and older taggers. Add DeepJet (fallback option) and UParT (latest and greatest).
- Pileup Jet ID:  Following up PR #46137, now adds Pileup Jet ID discriminant in NanoAOD.

#### PR validation:

- passes the usual runTheMatrix test: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
- passes MiniAOD workflows: `runTheMatrix.py -i all --ibeos  -l 2500.021,2500.022,2500.023,2500.024,2500.031,2500.032,2500.033,2500.034`
title: [MiniAOD, NanoAOD] Update AK8 subjet b-taggers, add pileup jet ID
